micro_tips: When customers raise price or competitor objections, actively clarify their specific concerns to ensure you address the root issue.
After handling objections, confidently propose a specific next step to guide the customer towards a decision.
Acknowledge objections directly and summarize the customer's main points before offering a solution to build rapport and ensure alignment.
reasons: No long monologue segments detected (healthy pacing).
Objections detected and empathy signals present (better handling likelihood).
Closing attempt detected (next step / demo / proposal).
